commands.name: az mobile-network data-network create
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network data-network create --data-network-name
                                      --mobile-network-name
                                      --resource-group
                                      [--description]
                                      [--location]
                                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--tags]
examples: az mobile-network data-network create -n data-network-name -g rg --mobile-network-name mobile-network-name

commands.name: az mobile-network data-network delete
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network data-network delete [--data-network-name]
                                      [--ids]
                                      [--mobile-network-name]
                                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--subscription]
                                      [--yes]
examples: az mobile-network data-network delete -n data_network-name --mobile-network-name mobile-network-name -g rg -y

commands.name: az mobile-network data-network list
commands.summary: List all data networks in the mobile network.
examples: az mobile-network data-network list --mobile-network-name mobile-network-name -g rg

commands.name: az mobile-network data-network show
commands.summary: Get information about the specified data network.
examples: az mobile-network data-network show -n data-network-name --mobile-network-name mobile-network-name -g rg

commands.name: az mobile-network data-network update
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network data-network update [--add]
                                      [--data-network-name]
                                      [--description]
                                      [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--ids]
                                      [--mobile-network-name]
                                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--remove]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--set]
                                      [--subscription]
                                      [--tags]
examples: az mobile-network data-network update -n data-network-name -g rg --mobile-network-name mobile-network-name --tags "{tag:test,tag2:test2}"

commands.name: az mobile-network data-network wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
